Name: State of Anarchy: Master of Mayhem
About the game: Simplistic top-down shooter that will put a smile on your face. You were an ordinary citizen in a small town… Now it’s on fire! Rioters are storming the houses while aliens rampage in the sky! Run as fast as you can! Shoot anything that moves! Do not release the gas pedal! Anarchy has never been so much fun! Grab your gun and join the fun! Features: Prepare for intense run & gun action! Enjoy hilarious doodle graphics and mouth made sound effects! Use 50+ weapons. New gun on every level! Shoot 80+ enemies and bosses! Drive 3 cars and 6 spaceships! Obtain new talents and weapon upgrades! Beat 48 stages! Enjoy awesome rock music!
